title: Annotator not able to change label
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

Project admin added labels to the document and assign annotator. I want the annotator to change the labels labeled by project admin. To achieve this in the django admin page i add the following permissions 
```
api | label | Can add label
api | label | Can change label
api | label | Can delete label
api | label | Can view label
api | document annotation | Can add document annotation
api | document annotation | Can change document annotation
api | document annotation | Can delete document annotation
api | document annotation | Can view document annotation
```
after this also annotator not able to change the label. In the backend i see the following error 
```
Forbidden: /v1/projects/82/docs/17425/annotations/1106
[13/May/2020 05:00:30] "DELETE /v1/projects/82/docs/17425/annotations/1106 HTTP/1.1" 403 63
```
Please suggest any idea about this problem to solve.
<!--
Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment. -->

*   Operating System:  Ubuntu 18.04
*   Python Version Used: 3.6
*   When you install doccano: Feb 2020
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): git+clone and installed from source
